title: Topic 003 Question 071
body: You are building an app that will answer customer calls about the status of an order. The app will query a database for the order details and provide the customers with a spoken response.
You need to identify which Azure AI service APIs to use. The solution must minimize development effort.
Which object should you use for each requirement? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
